alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Interior Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 11:46AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rockingham and southeastern Strafford Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1146 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Salisbury, or near Hampton, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Hampton, Durham, Exeter, Kittery, Dover, Epping, Brentwood, Greenland, Newington, Seabrook, Rye, Stratham, Newmarket, Kingston, Lee, East Kingston, Hampton Falls, Kensington, and Madbury. This includes Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 0 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
